Description: An Entry Level Solar Sales Representative is responsible for selling solar panel systems and related products and services to residential and commercial customers.
A Finance Director is responsible for overseeing the financial operations of State Farm. Including accounting and financial reporting.
A Network Engineer is responsible for designingand maintaining computer networks for the City of Knoxville. They are also responsible for troubleshooting any network-related issues that may arise.
A Psychiatric Nurse Practitioner (PNP) is a licensed healthcare professional who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of mental health disorders.
